N=input()
while N:
      N-=1
      a=input()
      count=0
      more=1
      while more==1:
            n=str(a)
            more=0
            for x in range(0,(len(n)+1)/2):
                  if n[x]!=n[len(n)-x-1]:
                        more=1
                        break
            if more==1:
                  count+=1
                  y=0
                  for i in range(len(n)-1,-1,-1):
                        y=(10*y)+int(n[i])
                  a=a+y
            else:
                  print count, a
                  more=0
                  break
